nodes.text: Jorec Gemen was a male Zygerrian, who served as a Royal archivist alongside his brother Mard Gemen during the rule of Queen Miraj Scintel. When King Atai Molec came to power, Jorec and his brother were reassigned to serve Molec's son, Prince Sono Molec, on the planet Kowak. The two brothers were unhappy with such reassignment.
